tosdr.case: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes
quoteText:
hen you create an account and profile on the Quora Platform, we collect your name, contact information, and other information you provide, such as topics that you know about or find interesting.
Your name, photo, and any other information that you choose to add to your public-facing profile will be available for viewing to users of the Quora Platform.
